name: Bunny Hop (itch) (Endurion)
description:
This game was an entry for the Gamedev.Net competition "Death is Progress".

The poor bunny is sooo hungry. Gather all carrots to feed it!
Every now and then a bunny will have to die to go forward :)

Caution: Contains blood!

It's a small 3d puzzle platformer, with 20 stages overall. Half of them tutorials even.

Have fun!
